        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.46c6a00e:
sns.set(rc={'figure.figsize':(15,10)})
fig = plt.figure()
sns.lineplot(x='REF_DATE', y='Average income (excluding zeros)', data=grouped_GEO, hue='GEO');
plt.xlabel('DATE')
plt.ylabel('Average income')
plt.title('Average income of GEO over time in Canada')
